subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: After a disastrous 2012 season, the Red Sox shunned the most expensive options like Zack Greinke to sign “upper-middle-class” veterans with playoff experience to modest contracts.
snippet: After a disastrous 2012 season, the Red Sox shunned the most expensive options like Zack Greinke to sign “upper-middle-class” veterans with playoff experience to modest contracts.
